original_text: 22% of Ethiopian adults reported account ownership in 2011
34% of Ethiopian adults reported account ownership in 2014
35% of Ethiopian adults reported account ownership in 2017
37% of Ethiopian adults reported account ownership in 2021
42% of Ethiopian women reported account ownership in 2024
notes: Gender gap is critical for policy design
